item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Its not just a job! Its our passion.

Let us take care of your renovation solution today!

.

074 141 1494

Our Sevices

Building
New builds and repairs to houses, factories and buildings. Building of boundary walls, extensions and new buildings including installation of roofing. General building works that include bricks, concrete, plastering & Rhinolite Renovations to the inside and outside of your home or building Supply and installation of Aluminium doors and windows
Roof Repairs
Parapet roofs Concrete Tiled roofs IBR, Chromodek roofs Support of current ceiling boards, installation of new ceiling boards and new cornices Roof structures Wooden
Road & Walk ways
Installation of paving for walkways and roadways. Roadways have compaction tests done and G5 mixtures installed where needed. Compaction with Bomag rollers. Small tar projects
Painting
Whether spray painted or hand painted All types of walls Roofs Steel Wood Driveways
Drainage
Installation of French drains Installation of Dimple sheet drainage systems Installation of gutters and downpipes Installation and repairs to main drain underground systems Roadway drainage & property drainage
Electrical
We have qualified electricians and that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.
Plumbing
We have qualified plumbers that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.
Waterproofing
Application of Thermoflex waterproofing systems (Torchon systems) Application of water based waterproofing systems Application of Cementitious waterproofing systems Application of Bitchumen waterproofing systems Application of Rubberised waterproofing systemsA line about the service you've mentioned above.

Why Choose Us

We are driven to provide value for our clients to every project that we engage in
Mission
Our mission is to build long term relationships with our clients and to continuously provide you with the highest standards of quality and service, meeting our clients expectations and approval. We do this by ensuring we have a knowledgeable, dedicated and inspired team of members.
Vision
Murtons Home Improvement strives to always deliver excellence. We believe that integrity and teamwork play a significant role in providing the highest standards of service to our clients. We strive to continuously create opportunities for our team to learn and grow and we embrace our role in adding value to every project that we engage in.
High Skills
Murtons has a core group of knowledgeable team members who have been with us for many years. All new team members are appropriately sourced and are subject to background checks and skills assessments, ensuring the security of our clients as well as quality of workmanship.
Compliance
Some of our projects are carried out in consultation with a structural engineer and architects, where necessary. We adhere to supplier application standards and building standards. We plan and prepare to the best of our ability, ensuring that that final product is long lasting. + Clients Serviced + Projects Completed Years Established + Avg Emplyees

What's Our Clients Say

Let some of our happy clients do the speaking! If you are looking for some awesome, knowledgeable people to work with, these are the guys I highly recommend. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Russel CA(SA) - Business Owner If you are looking for some awesome, knowledgeable people to work with, these are the guys I highly recommend. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Carmen Haas Freelancer

item.title: murtons
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Its not just a job! Its our passion.

Let us take care of your renovation solution today!

.

074 141 1494

Our Services

Project scope delivery
Building

New builds and repairs to houses, factories and buildings. Building of boundary walls, extensions and new buildings including installation of roofing. General building works that include bricks, concrete, plastering & Rhinolite Renovations to the inside and outside of your home or building Supply and installation of Aluminium doors and windows

Roof Repairs

Parapet roofs Concrete Tiled roofs IBR, Chromodek roofs Support of current ceiling boards, installation of new ceiling boards and new cornices Roof structures Wooden

Road & Walk ways

Installation of paving for walkways and roadways. Roadways have compaction tests done and G5 mixtures installed where needed. Compaction with Bomag rollers. Small tar projects

Painting

Whether spray painted or hand painted All types of walls Roofs Steel Wood Driveways

Drainage

Installation of French drains Installation of Dimple sheet drainage systems Installation of gutters and downpipes Installation and repairs to main drain underground systems Roadway drainage & property drainage

Electrical

We have qualified electricians and that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.

Plumbing

We have qualified plumbers that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.

Waterproofing

Application of Thermoflex waterproofing systems (Torchon systems) Application of water based waterproofing systems Application of Cementitious waterproofing systems Application of Bitchumen waterproofing systems Application of Rubberised waterproofing systemsA line about the service you've mentioned above.

Why Choose Us

We are driven to provide value for our clients to every project that we engage in

Mission

Our mission is to build long term relationships with our clients and to continuously provide you with the highest standards of quality and service, meeting our clients expectations and approval. We do this by ensuring we have a knowledgeable, dedicated and inspired team of members.

Vision

Murtons Home Improvement strives to always deliver excellence. We believe that integrity and teamwork play a significant role in providing the highest standards of service to our clients. We strive to continuously create opportunities for our team to learn and grow and we embrace our role in adding value to every project that we engage in.

High Skills

Murtons has a core group of knowledgeable team members who have been with us for many years. All new team members are appropriately sourced and are subject to background checks and skills assessments, ensuring the security of our clients as well as quality of workmanship.

Compliance

Some of our projects are carried out in consultation with a structural engineer and architects, where necessary. We adhere to supplier application standards and building standards. We plan and prepare to the best of our ability, ensuring that that final product is long lasting.

Home Delivery Happy People Tons Of Goods Tree plant

What's Our Clients Say

Let real testimonials do the speaking! Pick the best and display them in this section.

If you are looking for some awesome, knowledgeable people to work with, these are the guys I highly recommend. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Robert Berger Manager If you are looking for some awesome, knowledgeable people to work with, these are the guys I highly recommend. Their friendliness and result-driven approach are what I love about them. Carmen Haas Freelancer

item.title: murtons
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Its not just a job! Its our passion.

Let us take care of your renovation solution today!

.

074 141 1494

Our Services

Project scope delivery
Building

New builds and repairs to houses, factories and buildings. Building of boundary walls, extensions and new buildings including installation of roofing. General building works that include bricks, concrete, plastering & Rhinolite Renovations to the inside and outside of your home or building Supply and installation of Aluminium doors and windows

Roof Repairs

Parapet roofs Concrete Tiled roofs IBR, Chromodek roofs Support of current ceiling boards, installation of new ceiling boards and new cornices Roof structures Wooden

Road & Walk ways

Installation of paving for walkways and roadways. Roadways have compaction tests done and G5 mixtures installed where needed. Compaction with Bomag rollers. Small tar projects

Painting

Whether spray painted or hand painted All types of walls Roofs Steel Wood Driveways

Drainage

Installation of French drains Installation of Dimple sheet drainage systems Installation of gutters and downpipes Installation and repairs to main drain underground systems Roadway drainage & property drainage

Electrical

We have qualified electricians and that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.

Plumbing

We have qualified plumbers that have worked with us for many years and who in turn share our same passion, vision and mission.

Waterproofing

Application of Thermoflex waterproofing systems (Torchon systems) Application of water based waterproofing systems Application of Cementitious waterproofing systems Application of Bitchumen waterproofing systems Application of Rubberised waterproofing systemsA line about the service you've mentioned above.

Why Choose Us

We are driven to provide value for our clients to every project that we engage in

Mission

Our mission is to build long term relationships with our clients and to continuously provide you with the highest standards of quality and service, meeting our clients expectations and approval. We do this by ensuring we have a knowledgeable, dedicated and inspired team of members.

Vision

Murtons Home Improvement strives to always deliver excellence. We believe that integrity and teamwork play a significant role in providing the highest standards of service to our clients. We strive to continuously create opportunities for our team to learn and grow and we embrace our role in adding value to every project that we engage in.

High Skills

Murtons has a core group of knowledgeable team members who have been with us for many years. All new team members are appropriately sourced and are subject to background checks and skills assessments, ensuring the security of our clients as well as quality of workmanship.

Compliance

Some of our projects are carried out in consultation with a structural engineer and architects, where necessary. We adhere to supplier application standards and building standards. We plan and prepare to the best of our ability, ensuring that that final product is long lasting.

item.content:encoded:
Contact

A contact us page is among the most important pages on your website. This is where clients, customers, job seekers, industry experts will look up to when they wish to contact you.

Getting In Touch Is Easy!

You can explain various reasons why a visitor could contact you. Use this space to let them know that you are here to answer all their queries. If there is any other place to contact you, you can mention that too. Let us make it attractive so that people can easily get in touch with you.

[wpforms id="823"]

Address

Weltevreden Park, Roodepoort, 1709

Mail Us

info@murtons.co.za
